communityconfiguration-guidelines-descri: Community Configuration is a tool that allows communities to set up and control the configuration of different Wikipedia features, helping administrators suit their community specific needs.
communityconfiguration-guidelines-guidel: [[mw:Help:Growth|Learn more]] about Community Configuration, what it is, how it works, and the teamâ€™s ongoing work on it.
